channel.title: Tail Recursion on The Working R Programmer
channel.description: Recent content in Tail Recursion on The Working R Programmer

item.title: Thunks and Trampolines
item.description: Have you ever written a recursive function that you couldn’t use because you ran out of stack space when you applied it to large data sizes? Then thunks and trampolines might be for you.

item.title: tailr â€” Tail Recursion Optimisation
item.description: Believe it or not, all the bother with setting up this blog was such that I could write this post easier than I could on Wordpress. So now, let us get to some actual R programming!
